titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the El Malcriado: Spanish language newspaper, 1964-1975
titlepage.publisher:
Department of Special Collections and University Archives
Stanford University Libraries
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 The Board of Trustees of Stanford University. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Issues of El Malcriado collected by Father Victor P. Salandini. Some issues are in Spanish, with occasional issues in English.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Please request the materials at least 24 hours in advance of intended use.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] El Malcriado: Spanish language newspaper, M0882, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Issues of El Malcriado collected by Father Victor P. Salandini. Some issues are in Spanish, with occasional issues in English.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Agricultural Laborers
Mexican Americans--California--Newspapers
Trade-unions

did.physdesc: more than half of the issues are xeroxes

scopecontent.p: These issues are primarily in Spanish, though some English-language duplicates exist.
Issues no. 61 is missing; nos. 54-57 are in Spanish; nos. 53, 54, 57-65 exist in English language copies as well.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 2, nos. 1 - 20, 1968 Feb. 21 - 1968 Dec. 15

scopecontent.p: Volume 2, no. 17 is missing. Most of the issues are in English.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 2, nos. 21-22, 1969 Jan. 1 - 1969 Jan. 15

scopecontent.p: Issues are in English. Note: the issue marked Vol. 2, no. 22 is different than the subsequently-described Vol. 2, no. 22. Two issues share the same number.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 2, nos. 22-24, 1969 Feb. 1 - 1969 Feb. 15

scopecontent.p: Issues are in English. Note: the issue marked Vol. 2, no. 22 is different than the previously-described Vol. 2, no. 22. Two issues share the same number.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 3, nos. 1-17, 1969 Mar. 1 - 1969 Dec.

scopecontent.p: Issues are in English. Vol. 3, nos. 18 & 19 are missing

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 3, nos. 20-27, 1970 Feb. - 1970 June 15
El Malcriado, Vol. 4, nos. 1-3, 1970 June 15 - 1970 July 15

scopecontent.p: Issues are mostly in English. Note: the issue marked Vol. 4, no. 3 is different than the subsequently-described Vol. 4, no. 3. Two issues share the same number.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 4, nos. 3-14, 1970 Aug. 1 - 1971 Feb. 1

scopecontent.p: Issues are mostly in English. Note: the issue marked Vol. 4, no. 3 is different than the previously-described Vol. 4, no. 3. Two issues share the same number.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 5, nos. 1-15, 1972 Mar. 20 - 1972 Dec. 29

scopecontent.p: Issues are in English and Spanish. Vol. 5, no. 7 is missing.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 6, nos. 1-6, 1973 Jan. 12 - 1973 Mar. 23

scopecontent.p: Issues are in English and Spanish.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 6, nos. 7-25, 1973 Apr. 6 - 1973 Dec. 28

scopecontent.p: Issues 13-19 are in Spanish. Issues 7-12, 14, & 20-25 are in English. Vol. 6, no. 24 is missing.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 7, nos. 2-5, 1974 Feb. 22 - 1974 May 29

scopecontent.p: Issues are in English. Vol. 7, no. 1 is missing.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 7, nos. 10-11, 1974 Oct. 18 - 1974 Dec. 9

scopecontent.p: Issues are in English. Vol. 7, nos. 6-9 are missing.

did.unittitle: El Malcriado, Vol. 8, no. 1, 1975 Jan. - 1975 Feb.
